inclusion.criterion: Preterm infants less than or equal to 29 weeks' gestation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Congenital intrauterine infection, known to be associated with liver involvement and cholestasis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known structural liver abnormalities that are associated with cholestasis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known genetic disorders: trisomy 21, trisomy 13 and trisomy 18
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Infants meeting the criteria for terminal illness (eg, pH < 6.8 > 2 hours)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
